blockDescriptions.label: Label: For specific properties (always appears first)
blockDescriptions.conditionals: Check/If/Else: Conditional structures (fixed values, Formula Mode only)
blockDescriptions.line: Line: Line separator (always generates "/", Formula Mode only)
blockDescriptions.combat: Ranged/Melee/Weapond/Parry: Follow SK pattern (R:, M:, D:, P:)
blockDescriptions.based: Based: Based value with prefix "Based:" (Formula Mode only)

formatRules.labelText: Label/Text: Automatically wrapped in double quotes
formatRules.weapond: Weapond: Prefix "D:" added automatically with quotes (no space)
formatRules.line: Line: Always generates "/" automatically (Formula Mode only)
formatRules.ifElse: If/Else: Always generate "/if" and "/else" automatically (Formula Mode only)
formatRules.based: Based: Prefix "Based:" added automatically (Formula Mode only)

checkboxDescriptions.blind: Blind: Adds "!" prefix before Skills, Spells, and Attributes (disabled in Formula Mode)
checkboxDescriptions.formula: Formula: Wraps each block in individual brackets and enables conditional blocks
checkboxDescriptions.trueCondition: True Condition: Adds "?" prefix before any block

help.exampleText: In Formula Mode: Drag "If", "Melee" (edit to "Spear"), "Weapon Damage" (edit to "spear"). Result: /if [M:Spear] [D:"spear"]
